message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to acquire a product that I believe will be highly valuable to you.  While I can't disclose the exact details, I assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1400000.  This is a price I believe represents a fair value for both of us.  Let me know if you're interested and we can discuss the details further.
